name: TCM Slug
description:
Tecnocampus is in danger...
We thought 2020 couldn't get worse, but thankfully our teachers are here to help us!

Mouse and left click to interact with the menu and character selector.

WASD to move and aim. While grounded you can't aim downwards but you can while airborn.

Space to jump

Enter to shoot
